title: Launches Client (NEW) Gets message saying im not connected
body:
This client has so many issues, now this...

I get told im not connected to the net (but in posting this its pretty obvious i am) Then when i restart/shutdown the client like it says, and relaunch it comes up with the same message.

Support page had no explanation to how to fix it, and blamed my connection for it which is complete bs

Please fix this

replies.body: As was stated below, please try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5), let me know if this resolves your issues.

it worked, put the dns codes as 

8-8-8-8 then 8-8-4-4
How you change the DNS server code?
Try changing your DNS server addresses to google's public ones
Yep, just  made a post, have the same problem. Upvoted your post, hopefully it gets some attention.
